text: Ruplizumab (trade name Antova) is a humanized monoclonal antibody intended for the treatment of rheumatic diseases like systemic lupus erythematosus and lupus nephritis. A study showed that the drug was associated with life- threatening thromboembolisms, while another study only found thrombocytopenia. == References == Category:Monoclonal antibodies
title: Ruplizumab
